output:
Map {

Streaming & Online TV {
  Sign Up/Login: Allow users to create an account and log in to the application.
  Search & Browse: Allow users to search and browse for content.
  Watch & Record: Allow users to watch and record content.
  Playlists: Allow users to create and manage playlists.
  Recommendations: Allow users to receive personalized recommendations.
  Notifications: Allow users to receive notifications about new content.
  Settings: Allow users to customize their settings.
  Payment: Allow users to make payments for content.
  Social Sharing: Allow users to share content with friends.
  Ratings & Reviews: Allow users to rate and review content.
  Support: Allow users to access customer support.
}

}
